column2: 1.  The Commissioner should give  reasons  as to why she did not

make an order  under Section  18(A)  2  (b)  (i) 
of the Rent Act at the
In the event the Commissioner decides to make order under 18 A
2  (b)  (ii).  She is required to consider the question of the
compensation afresh in the light of material that is submitted by
the parties based on the market value.
